adala manthriwaraya pasugiya 04 wanida pawathi kasbawa nagara sabhawe maha sabha raswimatada ekwa thibenawa.ee anuwayi eeta sahabhagi wu kasbawa nagara sabhawe sabhapathiwaraya athulu nagarika manthriwarun 33 denata swayan nirodhayanaya wana lesa upades laba di aththe.sumana wiraman ranawira namathi mema manthriwaraya pasugiya 05 wanida pawathi madhya hamuwakatada ekwa siti athara, piliyandala polis bala pradeshaya hudekala kirimath samanga athi wu thaththwayath samanga amathya gamini lokugeta sahaya dakwima sandaha eya kandawa thibuna.me athara, piliyandala podu welandapole 49 hawiridi palathuru welandasal himikaruweku korona aasadanaya wimen pasugiya 05 wanida jiwithakshayata pathwu athara, ee hethuwen ema podu welandapole welandun 340 deneku sandaha korona parikshana sidukara thibuna.in parikshana 246 ka prathipala ada labi thibu athara, ee mangin thahawuru wi aththe 101 denekuta korona wairasaya aasadanaya wi athi bawayi.me sambandhayen piliyandala saukhya waidya niladhari karyalaye pawathi sakachchawedi wishesha awadhanayak yomu wu athara, ehidi thiranaya kerune piliyandala podu welanda sankirnaya nawatha danumdenathuru wasa damimatayi.ema thiranayath samanga mahajana saukhya parikshakawarun wisin podu welandapole siti welandun saha janathawa iwath kirimata ada katayuthu kala.me athara, amathya gamini lokuge hiru prawruththi anshaya samanga wishesha sammukha sakachchawakata ekwemin kiya sitiye pasugiyada hudekala kala piliyandala polis bala pradeshaya hudekala bawin nidahas kirimata thaman kisidu balapamak sidunokala bawayi.
me mathiwanayata wishesha meheyum kamituwak path wenawa.
